result.markdown: --- title: A conversation about Equity, Diversity, Inclusion and Accessibility (EDIA) in the RSE community description: | Reflections on successes and challenges date: 2024-07-31 author: - name: Ella Kaye - name: Malvika Sharan image: ella-malvika.png image-alt: | Two headshots, side by side. One is of Ella Kaye, the other of Malvika Sharan. --- ::: {.cell} ::: ` slides`{=html} ` materials`{=html} ` video`{=html} ## Overview Ella Kaye (Research Software Engineer, University of Warwick) and Malvika Sharan (Senior Researcher – Open Research at the Alan Turing Institute and co-lead of The Turing Way) will converse about their experiences in/with the RSE community, as well as both the challenges and successes they’ve encountered when working to improve EDIA. They will discuss the importance and difficulties of community-building and why it matters from an EDIA perspective. They will also consider the intersectionality between developing an RSE identity and their identities as members of groups under-represented in the broader RSE community. There will be time for questions and further discussion. ## Event details **Event:** [DiveRSE](https://diverse-rse.github.io/events/2024-07-31), part of the [seminar series](https://diverse-rse.github.io) **Date:** July 31st, 2024 **Time:** 15:00 **Location:** Zoom ## Slides Keyboard shortcuts for slideshow (once you've clicked inside it): - Use ← and → to navigate through the slides - Use o for an overview of all slides - Use ? for an overview more keyboard shortcuts - Click the hamburger menu in the bottom left corner of the slide deck for more options - f to toggle full screen doesn't work from this page. Go to [slides](https://ellakaye.github.io/2024-07-31-diverse/) and use that shortcut from there instead
